sense.def:
To scrabble at something
pomeni praskati po čem s prsti ali nogami.

seg.quote: I hung there, scrabbling with my feet to find a foothold.

sense.def:
To scrabble around
pomeni premikati roke naokoli, da bi našli nekaj, česar ne vidimo.

seg.quote: I scrabbled around on the floor and eventually found my ring.
